flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Please visit my DIY how-to at http://www.instructables.com/id/How-to-U... for instructions and a demonstration video.
guide.introduction_rendered: Please visit my DIY how-to at http://www.instructables.com/id/How-to-U... for instructions and a demonstration video.
guide.summary: Use the DaVinci Code Cryptex as a beautiful, ready-made steampunk hardware encryption for your USB memory flash drive.
guide.title: Steampunk USB Memory Flash Drive Hardware Encryption
